name: go-link-tree
title: Go Link Tree
description: Quick access to your personal link tree
author: mikemajara

commands.name: go
commands.title: Go
commands.description: Quick jump to links - type 'go' followed by your search

preferences.name: configPath
preferences.title: Configuration File
preferences.description: Path to your links configuration file (YAML or JSON)
